application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
086A
TPO/2008/0086
TPO/1968/0086

T1 & T2  Horse Chestnut & Yew tree-remove lower basal epicormic growth. 
T2 - Yew tree- crown reduce singular branch that has grown particularly far over the public road by no more than 1.5m.
T3 - Cherry tree- crown reduce back to the most recent previous points of reduction to continue the ongoing maintenance of the tree.
T4 - Fruit tree or similar situated directly next to T3, crown reduce in height by no more than 2.0m to reduce the risk of the tree from failing. 
G2 (Sycamore & Ash) - remove crossing limbs and dead wood
T8 - Silver Birch, crown reduce in height by no more than 3.0m.
G3 -  4 x Lime trees- re-pollard.
T9 - Lime tree- re-pollard.
T10 - Lime tree, re-pollard.
G4 - Row of Plum trees- crown reduce the branches that overhang the front gardens of the houses behind.
